axes.label: Information Integrity in the Digital Age

evidence_log.content_summary: Public skepticism about 'real' vs. AI-generated content, AI misuse for smear campaigns.
Further posts on human-AI distinction (cosplayer, original art vs AI) and claims of manipulated photos to discredit drug war victims reinforce the tension around information integrity.

axes.label: Sovereignty in the West Philippine Sea
axes.left_pole: Adherence to International Law & National Sovereignty

evidence_log.content_summary: China Coast Guard attacking Filipino vessel with water cannons in Philippine territorial waters.
Chinese Coast Guard attacked Filipino civilians with water cannons while supplying aid in disputed waters, reinforcing aggressive territorial assertion.

axes.label: Integrity of Judicial Process & Witness Protection

evidence_log.content_summary: Allegations of defense counsel leaking identifiable information on protected witnesses during ICC broadcast.

Accusations against ICC investigators, alleged leaking of witness info by defense, calls for accountability from drug war victims' families, and an Archbishop's homily expressing shame over current affairs. This indicates a high level of contention and perceived compromise around the judicial process and calls for integrity.
